comment.body:
[basxto](#comment_1_1PVcdu7USZH2kHMETbqDYLPjJZKCDWM52k): Why do you inline youtu.be?  That beats the purpose of this whole network

How should I do it?

> [andre](#comment_1_1uwy3F41gsLFpc3KbkM7mv5cPugQmW659): I wish more people would start writing in it, instead of just talking about it.

I plan to on here :)

> [shevek](#comment_1_1FKv8ekYrPvVxZASX4Rk6EYQYpASnHaiXn): Mi jam lernis! Eĉ sen neceso de "duolingo" :-)

Duolingo helpis min multe. Ankaŭ mi uzas Anki kaj Kurso de Esperanto.
